markdown.markdown:
::::{.hp-tutorial} :::{.hp-thumbnail} ![](images/tutorial-thumbnails/TN_basic_server_access.png) ::: :::{.hp-text} [Basic access to the AIMS eReefs Server]{.hp-title}
Learn the basics of extracting aggregated eReefs data from the AIMS server using the efficient OPeNDAP data access protocol. ::: :::{.hp-links} [{{< fa brands r-project >}} R](tutorials/r/access-ereefs-data-server/basic-server-access/basic_server_access_r.qmd)
[{{< fa brands python >}} Python](tutorials/python/access-ereefs-data-server/basic-server-access/basic_server_access_python.qmd) ::: :::: ::::{.hp-tutorial} :::{.hp-thumbnail} ![](images/tutorial-thumbnails/TN_programmatic_server_access.png) ::: :::{.hp-text} [Programmatic access to the AIMS eReefs Server]{.hp-title}
Extends the methods introduced in the basic access tutorial to programmatically extract aggregated eReefs data from the AIMS server for multiple dates and points. ::: :::{.hp-links} [{{< fa brands r-project >}} R](tutorials/r/access-ereefs-data-server/programmatic-server-access/programmatic_server_access_r.qmd)
[{{< fa brands python >}} Python](tutorials/python/access-ereefs-data-server/programmatic-server-access/programmatic_server_access_python.qmd) ::: :::: ## Plot eReefs data ::::{.hp-tutorial} :::{.hp-thumbnail} ![](images/tutorial-thumbnails/TN_time_series_plots.png) ::: :::{.hp-text} [Time series plots]{.hp-title}
Learn how to create time series plots of eReefs data.
[*Note: the python tutorial has not yet been updated to cover the more advanced topics included in the R tutorial*] ::: :::{.hp-links} [{{< fa brands r-project >}} R](tutorials/r/plot-ereefs-data/time-series-plot/time_series_plot_r.qmd)
[{{< fa brands python >}} Python](tutorials/python/plot-ereefs-data/time-series-plot/time_series_plot_python.qmd) ::: :::: ## Process eReefs data ::::{.hp-tutorial} :::{.hp-thumbnail} ![](images/tutorial-thumbnails/TN_correlation_wind_current.png) ::: :::{.hp-text} [Correlation: wind and current]{.hp-title}
Learn how to extract and process eReefs data to answer the question: *How strong does the wind need to be to set the direction of the surface ocean currents?* ::: :::{.hp-links} [{{< fa brands r-project >}} R](tutorials/r/process-ereefs-data/correlation/correlation_wind_and_current_r.qmd)
[{{< fa brands python >}} Python](tutorials/python/process-ereefs-data/correlation/correlation_wind_and_current_python.qmd) ::: ::::
